definitions.definition: An aircraft that is borne along by one or more sets of long rotating blades which allow it to hover, move in any direction including reverse , or land; and typically having a smaller set of blades on its tail to stabilize the aircraft .
examples: We flew over the city in a helicopter .

definitions.definition: A powered troweling machine with spinning blades used to spread concrete .
The winged fruit of certain trees, such as ash , elm , and maple .
A dragonfly ; so named due to its resemblance to a helicopter (sense 1).
A whirling trick performed with devil sticks .
A breakdance move in which the dancer spins on the floor while extending the legs to resemble the blades of a helicopter.

main_definition: ( aircraft ) An aircraft that is borne along by one or more sets of long rotating blades which allow it to hover, move in any direction including reverse , or land; and typically having a smaller set of blades on its tail to stabilize the aircraft .
secondary_definitions: A powered troweling machine with spinning blades used to spread concrete .
( botany ) The winged fruit of certain trees, such as ash , elm , and maple .
( zoology , slang ) A dragonfly ; so named due to its resemblance to a helicopter (sense 1).
A whirling trick performed with devil sticks .
( dance ) A breakdance move in which the dancer spins on the floor while extending the legs to resemble the blades of a helicopter.
